texts.text: Patch 12 was a version of Wii U Edition released on September 15, 2016.[1] [edit]

Remove vote-to-kick function in mini games.
The host can kick players only in the lobby.

MCCE-67 – Beacon/lava bug
MCCE-1624 – Slime block plane bug
MCCE-1688 – Cannot breed/go into love mode
MCCE-1715 – Particles turn black when in water
MCCE-1744 – Strange breaking texture for chests
MCCE-1802 – Piston East Side head to tail
MCCE-1881 – Zombies holding items no longer despawn
MCCE-1889 – Mobs and entities turn lightish-blue when viewed with Night Vision
MCCE-1977 – Lag-bug from waterflow
MCCE-2016 – Boats ridden onto slabs kills you instantly
MCCE-2240 – Prismarine animation does not fade correctly
MCCE-2243 – Easily double-pressing start or back
MCCE-2335 – Experience amount not fading at zero opacity.
MCCE-2339 – Rain in the taiga biome
MCCE-2345 – Painting needs full wall instead of 2x1, 2x4, 3x4, etc
MCCE-2387 – Can no longer quick switch blocks
MCCE-2412 – Slime block issue
MCCE-2434 – Slime block bug.
MCCE-2435 – Oversized breaking animation
MCCE-2437 – Landing on the corner of a block does not create particles
MCCE-2500 – Unable to purchase Chinese Mythology Mash-Up pack
Disable small, floating and oddly shaped skins in public Tumble games.
Fix for Battle mini game showdown playing Tumble mini game showdown sound.
Fixed a bug where last player to die in Tumble would get stuck respawning.
Fix for being able to unlock "Hunger Pain" achievement by the player killing themself while starving.
Fix for crash if a client wins the match and then quits the game.

Xbox 360 Edition TU42
Xbox One Edition CU32
PlayStation 3 Edition 1.35
PlayStation 4 Edition 1.35
PlayStation Vita Edition 1.35
"Minecraft: Wii U Edition Patch change logs" – Minecraft Forum, September 15, 2016.
